data.title: New Zealand Ministry of Justice
data.meta_description: Find information and contact details for a court, tribunal or other topics.
data.text:
Fines & payments »

Contact details for fines and civil enforcement.

Question, feedback or complaint »

Ask a question, give us feedback or make a complaint.

Jury service »

About to do jury service? Contact us if you have an questions.

Criminal record check »

Contact us after 20 working days if you need an update about your request.

Family »

Every District Court has a Family Court within it. Find the court you're looking for.

Courts & tribunals »

Find the phone number for the court or tribunal you need using our locator.

Find us »

Find the location and contact details of a court, tribunal or other office using our locator.

Legal aid »

Contact us about an application, a legal aid debt or find a regional office.

Victims information »

For information, advice and support for victims and their families and/or whānau.

Public Defence Service »

Get more information about your case or find a local office to help you.

National office »

Contact the Ministry of Justice national office in Wellington.
